column4: I've killed systems so bad before so many times just playin around I guess I'm used to it now
What video card are you running, b?
Are you using hardware acceleration, and what drivers?
The acceleration (reason for buying a nice card) seems to be a feature I would like to have enabled, but with Xorg, it seems to be a problem
I know how, but every time you update the driver, or update the kernel, you have to go through this big thing
and b, thanks. I've saved the page and I'll look into it later
I put in a SB live card when I was having problems, and everything was fixed
did you upgrade, and did you have any problems?
yes, only that X didn't start, which was trivial to fix
help! That's my problem. I don't know how to fix it
can I ask what you did again? Maybe I wrote it down wrong. Was it "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-org?
seems like you're needed tonight. I'll try a few other things and let you know. Thanks for your help. Night
